name: The Pointless knight
description:
a little game i made as a test in GB studio using assets form the sample game. it is a work in progress, so new stuff will be added. make sure to talk to all the NPCs! all you have to do is download the game and play it in a GB or GBC emulator, or play the browser version!

controls:

Z = A button

X = B button

arrow keys to move.
